trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Porterville
There were no other sightings in Porterville on or around March 29th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to talk on my cordless phone and sat on the edge of the porch. Looking up, to the South, I saw an orange, bright star like object moving briskly , going north. At first I figured it was an airplane, but I noticed it had no blinking lights and was moving very swiftly. The light from it wasn't pulsing or anything either. It wasn't making any noise, and it is a clear night. I called for my wife, who came out and also observed it. It went right over our house, and passed the edge of our roof out of view. I ran into the yard and caught a glimpse of it before it completely disappeared. It had no blinking lights, but I got the impression it's altitude wasn't very high.
Summary: Bright Orange silent Venus sized object moving south to north over home, fairly fast, appeared fairly low
